perfadvisor.free.trial:
You can also apply for a Kunpeng remote lab for trial. A remote lab is pre-installed with the Kunpeng Porting Advisor, Kunpeng Compiler, Kunpeng Hyper Tuner, and Dynamic Binary Translator (ExaGear).
[Free Trial](command:extension.view.perfadvfreetrialremoteenvironment)
free.trial.remote.environment: Applying for a Remote Lab Trial
